title: About supplier
mainAdvice: Help buyers learn more about your organisation.
warningAdvice: If provided, this will be the default ‘supplier description’ on any listing pages for Catalogue Solutions supplied by your organisation. Any changes made will be visible across all your listing pages.

description.additionalAdvice: Provide information about your organisation, for example its ethos, experience and plans for the future.

errorResponse.maxLength: Description must be 1,100 characters or fewer

link.additionalAdvice: Provide a URL to a page that gives buyers further information about your organisation.

errorResponse.maxLength: Link to more information must be 1,000 characters or fewer
